title: paramAnanda sukham
sahitya:
paramAnanda sukham tarumE muruga nAmam pAril avadiyuruvOrin kavalai tIrum


anupallavi

  siridEnum anudinam cintai sidarAmal nirutti adaik-karudi varuvOrukkellAm


caraNam    kAsu paNa mOhattAl mOsam pOghum manadu vIsum kOpattAl vimmi veDikkAdu
mAsu paDiya mayakkum Ashaip-pishAcukkadu dAsanAgiDAmal vimOcanam aLikkum
